name: Aperture Venture Capital
description: Aperture Venture Capital is VC for the Multicultural Mainstream™, on a mission to redefine the venture landscape for generations of diverse entrepreneurs by building an ecosystem engineered for successful exits. They focus on the fintech innovation led by diverse founders and the strategic interests and capabilities of their corporate LPs, investing in Fintech, Enterprise, and Consumer startups. Their Diversity Investing API℠ platform is a key aspect of their model, designed to nurture engagement between corporate partners and portfolio companies.
